page.title: 09The Lollipop Lady
page.content: Our lollipop lady has been here for 17 years.She said that she likes her job because she likes children,meeting people who are passing and being outdoors.She got the job through our local police man.She helps the children across the road when they go to school. There is no special training but she goes to a seminar every year.She has to wear special clothes like gloves and a coat.They are waterproof,reflective and luminous so drivers can see her clearly.She carries a stick that looks like a big lollipop that says "STOP-CHILDREN".She is here four times a day which is very tying but she has never let us down. She is always there in all weathers to help the children across the road.She does not like it when children don't do as they're told or when people park their cars in the wrong place.
